xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/28974-A Woman of Paris: A Drama of Fate 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s24VgyvJliT7fUA909ZHJpoBx1D.jpg When Marie St. Clair believes she has been jilted by her artist fiance Jean, she decides to leave for Paris on her own. After spending a year in the city as a mistress of the wealthy Pierre Revel, she is reunited with Jean by chance. This leaves her with the choice between a glamorous life in Paris, and the true love she left behind. A Woman of Paris: A Drama of Fate
